ticket.title: Add plugin info / update / list as tracked_plugins does
ticket.original-body:
This would be very useful in updating / checking status of plugins and knowing when/where(repo/branch) they came from.
Atm it needs a lot of hacks to work, and bringing it into core would benefit all plugin installers.
http://github.com/grosser/tracked_plugins

version.body: Leave this as a plugin until there is a higher demand to get it into the core. Also, the plugin hasn't been updated since February :(. Maybe it's perfect.
